text: The Harpe was a mythical sword in Greek and Roman mythology. Harpe may also refer to: People: *Josef Harpe (1887 – 1968), German military general *Winfield S. Harpe ( 1937 – 1988), American Air Force officer *The Harpe brothers (Micajah and Wiley Harpe), American mass murderers In biology: *Harpe, a junior synonym of the fish genus Bodianus * Harpe, a reproductive structure in insects that is part of the valva'' ==See also== *Harp (disambiguation) *La Harpe (disambiguation)
title: Harpe (disambiguation)
